title: Say So
itunes:title: Say So
description:
In this message, Joel will remind you of the power of your confession. Psalm 107:2 says, “Let the redeemed of the Lord say so.” It doesn’t say let the redeemed think so, believe so or hope so. You’ve got to take it one step further and say so.----Visit https://joelosteen.com to receive daily updates and encouragement from Joel Osteen.----Have you followed Joel Osteen on Instagram? https://instagram.com/joelosteen.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
